DOC.brief_summary: Internet base self help program without support counselor test among anonymous Internet help seeker open access website .
DOC.brief_title: Anonymous Treatment Internet Alcohol Dependence : A Randomised , Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: A 5 module Internet base self help program base motivational interview cognitive behavioral therapy test among anonymous Internet help seekers.The design three arm randomize control study , outcomes measure term change alcohol consumption , problematic alcohol use , alcohol dependence alcohol use disorder , anxiety , well depression quality life . 2400 participant recruit entirely online open access website . Consenting participant randomize one three group : 1.Internet base self help program counselor support , 2.Internet base self help program without counselor support 3 . Information open access website resource : information alcohol health , find treatment online discussion forum . Follow-up conduct online 3 , 6 , 12 24 month three group .
DOC.criteria: AUDITscore > 16 point and/or least 3 criterion alcohol dependence ( ICD10 ) Inadequate Swedish language skills No Internet access
